name: Space Pirate Captain Harlock
overview: Space Pirate Captain Harlock is a strategy game developed by Family Soft and released by Takeru on June 13, 1992 in Japan for the PC-98. There are two game modes: "Campaign" where Harlock fights consecutive battlefields and "Scenario" where players can play against each other. You can choose "fleet battle story" in which you fight against the Mazon fleet on the Arcadia, and a "hand-to-hand combat story" that reproduces the confrontation with Queen Rafflesia in a Harlock-based fighting battle.
